search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Referral Factory (referral-factory.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Referral Factory is: [https://referral-factory.com/pricing](https://referral-factory.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing for all Referral Factory plans

extracted_content.content:
Flexible pricing plans that scales as you grow
----------------------------------------------

All plans include deep integrations with many CRMs and Stripe.

Monthly

Yearly

SAVE 20%

Starter

$76/ month

$912 annually

500 users

1 live referral program

Basic rewards

Integrations

Templates

Fraud alerts

ReCaptcha verification

Basic

$160/ month

$1920 annually

20,000 users

Unlimited referral programs

Everything in Starter, plus

Teammate access

Video call support

Webhooks & API

Referral analytics

Rewards and payouts

Pro

$320/ month

$3840 annually

40,000 users

Unlimited referral programs

Everything in Basic, plus

User verification

100% white label

Add your own domain

2FA secure account

Dedicated support

Enterprise

$800/ month

Starting at $9600 annually

100,000+ users

Unlimited referral programs

Everything in Pro, plus

Upload your own HTML

Pay by Invoice

Enable SSO

Host your own data (+$400)

Compare all plans →

What every plan gets you:
-------------------------

### Referral program builder

Use our AI powered builder to create a referral program. Page editors / upload HTML

### Widgets, pop ups, embeds.

Install pop ups and widgets on your website. These can work for logged out, and logged in users.

### Out of the box tracking

Send new referrals into your workflows. Automated conversion tracking.

### Integrations and automations

Connect to HubSpot, Stripe, Intercom, Salesforce, Zoho, Pipedrive, Zapier and more.

### 200+ types of rewards

200+ gift cards in multiple currencies. Cash payouts. Custom rewards for swag, tokens, discounts, coupons.

### Fraud alerts

Track users that sign up from the same IP, or using suspect emails. Don’t issue rewards for fake referrals.

Fully compliant and secure
--------------------------
